import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { Star, Menu, X, ArrowRight, Lightbulb, Target, TrendingUp, Users, Award, CheckCircle, Play, ArrowDown, Rocket, BarChart3, Shield, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; import './css/Homepage.css'; import img1 from './img/start-up-business-goals-strategy.jpg'; const Homepage = () => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); const [activeStep, setActiveStep] = useState(0); const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState({}); const [typedText, setTypedText] = useState(''); const heroRef = useRef(null); const sectionRefs = useRef({}); const fullText = "Skip the Guesswork. Build Your Startup Smarter."; // Typing animation effect useEffect(() => { let index = 0; const timer = setInterval(() => { if (index < fullText.length) { setTypedText(fullText.slice(0, index + 1)); index++; } else { clearInterval(timer); } }, 100); return () => clearInterval(timer); }, []); // Scroll effect useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { setScrolled(window.scrollY > 50); // Intersection observer for animations Object.entries(sectionRefs.current).forEach(([key, ref]) => { if (ref) { const rect = ref.getBoundingClientRect(); const isInView = rect.top < window.innerHeight * 0.8 && rect.bottom > 0; setIsVisible(prev => ({ ...prev, [key]: isInView })); } }); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); handleScroll(); // Initial check return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); // Auto-advance steps useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setActiveStep(prev => (prev + 1) % 3); }, 3000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); const stats = [ { number: "1000+", label: "Startups Launched", icon: Rocket }, { number: "95%", label: "Success Rate", icon: TrendingUp }, { number: "500+", label: "Active Mentors", icon: Users }, { number: "₹50Cr+", label: "Funding Secured", icon: Award } ]; const features = [ { icon: Target, title: "Idea Validation Toolkit", description: "Comprehensive framework to validate your startup idea before investing time and money", gradient: "from-orange-500 to-pink-500" }, { icon: BarChart3, title: "Market Research Hub", description: "Deep market analysis, competitor insights, and opportunity mapping tools", gradient: "from-blue-500 to-purple-500" }, { icon: Users, title: "Mentor Network", description: "Connect with industry experts and successful founders for guidance", gradient: "from-green-500 to-blue-500" }, { icon: Shield, title: "Risk Assessment", description: "Identify and mitigate potential risks before they become problems", gradient: "from-purple-500 to-pink-500" } ]; const steps = [ { number: "01", title: "Validate Your Idea", description: "Use our comprehensive validation framework to test your assumptions and prove market demand", icon: Target, color: "from-orange-400 to-pink-500" }, { number: "02", title: "Research & Plan", description: "Deep dive into market analysis, competitor research, and strategic planning with expert guidance", icon: BarChart3, color: "from-blue-400 to-purple-500" }, { number: "03", title: "Launch & Scale", description: "Execute your launch strategy with mentor support, funding connections, and growth frameworks", icon: Rocket, color: "from-green-400 to-blue-500" } ]; return (

Couldn't have done it without them.", author: "Anita Patel", role: "Founder, EcoSolutions Delhi", rating: 5, image: "👩‍🔬" } ].map((testimonial, index) => (
